channel.title: Quick Deltascape Help
channel.description:
I have a delta source and i been working on it for a whille (1 month) and i want some help witha few things please and ty
Anti Lure
How to stop noclipping with players and monsters
The monsters are all fucked when they attacka nd the elf warriors are holding a zammy gs on the ground lol
I know i can probabily find a tutorial on this but last time i trusted a tutorial i forgot to backup and lol i had to back up my whole comp that was fun ! lol so if u can give me a link to a TUT THAT WORKS ill love u forever and beyond :)
Your Friend Zach

item.description:
@Rune-Nation wrote:

LOL the creative scape thing yeah i was trying to play around with it but im not using a 474 i only like 317’s i cant figure that out i can show u my client and source atm it only has some skills working im still adding all the skill capes i only have untrimmed so far im a slow worker

Ill go to server devolopment later for everyone who thinks im leeching im gona take a buncha pics

item.title: Quick Deltascape Help
item.dc:creator: @Rune-Nation Rune-Nation
item.description:
@Rune-Nation wrote:

I did ask about agression because im used to 508 servers im the oppisate im going from 508 to a 317 because more ppl can play 317 servers i really need help with clipping

MY WHOLE LIFE WOULD BE EASIER IF I COULD FIND A SHARD REVOLUTION SOURCE AND CLIENT WITH NO ANTILEECH AND IM NOT USING CREATIVESCAPE BECAUSE I DONT LEECH thakyou i still need help with my original question

And as for me asking for help ive done alot without even needing a tutorial so this is the first time

Made every teleport
Made tele menue
Added monsters
Added the entire tavelry dungen
Added firemaking
Added stances and specs( I did download the models and gfx )
Claws (model and gfx downloaded also)

Ive done alot more so when im asking for a tiny bit of help dont flame … if ur gona flame go to download section and find leechers thx !

Read full topic
